com.nwawsoft.util.math

Class Math

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.nwawsoft.util.math.Math

  • public class Math
extends java.lang.Object
    Provides additional math functions and functions to work with native numerical data types such as int or double.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Math() 

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static int getDivisors(int candidate)
      Returns the amount of divisors the candidate has, including 1 and the candidate itself.
      static int round(double pDouble)
      Wrapper for roundDoubleToInt(double).
      static int roundDoubleToInt(double pDouble)
      Rounds the specified double down (2.001 - 2.499 to 2) or up (2.5 - 2.999 to 3) and returns the result as an int.
      static int sumFromXToY(int x, int y)
      Returns the sum of all integer values from a specified lower bound to a specified upper bound, including both bounds.
      static int sumUpToX(int x)
      Returns the sum of all integer values from 1 to the specified upper bound, including 1 and the upper bound.
      static double xToThePowerOfN(double x, int n)
      Calculates x^n.
      static float xToThePowerOfN(float x, int n)
      Calculates x^n.
      static int xToThePowerOfN(int x, int n)
      Calculates x^n.

    • Method Detail

      • roundDoubleToInt

        public static int roundDoubleToInt(double pDouble)
        Rounds the specified double down (2.001 - 2.499 to 2) or up (2.5 - 2.999 to 3) and returns the result as an int.
        Parameters:
        pDouble - the double to round.
        Returns:
        the corresponding int.

      • xToThePowerOfN

        public static int xToThePowerOfN(int x,
                                 int n)
        Calculates x^n.
        Parameters:
        x - any number
        n - any natural, positive number
        Returns:
        the result of x^n

                                    int n)
        Calculates x^n.

        Returns:
        the result of x^n

      • getDivisors

        public static int getDivisors(int candidate)
        Returns the amount of divisors the candidate has, including 1 and the candidate itself. For candidate = 1 this will only be 1.
        Parameters:
        candidate - the number to check for its divisor amount.
        Returns:
        the amount of divisors the candidate has, including 1 and the candidate itself.

      • round

        public static int round(double pDouble)
        Wrapper for roundDoubleToInt(double). Rounds the specified double down (2.001 - 2.499 to 2) or up (2.5 - 2.999 to 3) and returns the result as an int.
        Parameters:
        pDouble - the double to round.
        Returns:
        the corresponding int.

      • sumUpToX

        public static int sumUpToX(int x)
        Returns the sum of all integer values from 1 to the specified upper bound, including 1 and the upper bound. If x = 1 this will return 1. If an error occurs this function returns the value -1.
        Parameters:
        x - upper bound.
        Returns:
        the sum of all integers from 1 to x.

      • sumFromXToY

        public static int sumFromXToY(int x,
                              int y)
        Returns the sum of all integer values from a specified lower bound to a specified upper bound, including both bounds. If x = y this will return x. If an error occurs this function returns the value -1.
        Parameters:
        x - lower bound.
        y - upper bound.
        Returns:
        the sum of all integers from x to y.
